description: Starts a data ingestion job. Amazon Lookout for Equipment returns the job status.

parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: The name of the dataset being used by the data ingestion job.

parameters.name: IngestionInputConfiguration
parameters.description: Specifies information for the input data for the data ingestion job, including dataset S3 location. The location information for the S3 bucket used for input data for the data ingestion. The name of the S3 bucket used for the input data for the data ingestion. Prefix (string) --- The prefix for the S3 location being used for the input data for the data ingestion. KeyPattern (string) --- The pattern for matching the Amazon S3 files that will be used for ingestion. If the schema was created previously without any KeyPattern, then the default KeyPattern {prefix}/{component_name}/* is used to download files from Amazon S3 according to the schema. This field is required when ingestion is being done for the first time. Valid Values: {prefix}/{component_name}_* | {prefix}/{component_name}/* | {prefix}/{component_name}[DELIMITER]* (Allowed delimiters : space, dot, underscore, hyphen)

nested_params.name: S3InputConfiguration
nested_params.description: The location information for the S3 bucket used for input data for the data ingestion.

nested_params.name: Bucket
nested_params.description: The name of the S3 bucket used for the input data for the data ingestion.

nested_params.name: Prefix
nested_params.description: The prefix for the S3 location being used for the input data for the data ingestion.

nested_params.name: KeyPattern
nested_params.description: The pattern for matching the Amazon S3 files that will be used for ingestion. If the schema was created previously without any KeyPattern, then the default KeyPattern {prefix}/{component_name}/* is used to download files from Amazon S3 according to the schema. This field is required when ingestion is being done for the first time. Valid Values: {prefix}/{component_name}_* | {prefix}/{component_name}/* | {prefix}/{component_name}[DELIMITER]* (Allowed delimiters : space, dot, underscore, hyphen)

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access the data source for the data ingestion job.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request. If you do not set the client request token, Amazon Lookout for Equipment generates one. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: Indicates the job ID of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the StartDataIngestionJob operation.
